description: Tech giants are investing in the development of "sovereign" AI models in Europe to reduce the region's dependence on largely U.S.-controlled infrastructure.

title: X rival Bluesky gains 1.25 million users following U.S. election
description: Bluesky has gained over 1.25 million new users in the past week, indicating some social media users are changing their habits following the U.S. election.

title: Cisco reports fourth straight quarter of declining revenue
description: Cisco reported better-than-expected results for the latest quarter but revenue continues to shrink.

title: Trump victory may provide TikTok a lifeline to remain in the U.S.
description: Donald Trump's election victory may provide a lifeline for TikTok, which faces a potential U.S. ban in January if not divested from parent company ByteDance.

title: Tesla initiates sixth Cybertruck recall in a year
description: Tesla is voluntarily recalling 2,431 Cybertrucks to replace defective drive inverters, according to a filing with the National Highway Traffic Administration.

title: AMD to lay off 4% of workforce, or about 1,000 employees
description: At the end of last year, AMD had 26,000 employees, according to a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filing.

title: Amazon shuts down secret project to develop fertility tracker
description: The project, codenamed "Encore," was part of Amazon's moonshot incubator Grand Challenge, which launched under founder Jeff Bezos.

title: BlackRock expands its tokenized money market fund to Polygon and other blockchains
description: BlackRock launched the USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund on Ethereum earlier this year.

title: Bitcoin briefly tops $93,000 for the first time as investors digest postelection gains, inflation data
description: Bitcoin rose above $93,000 following slightly higher October inflation data Wednesday.

title: Buy now, pay later provider Klarna says it filed confidentially for U.S. IPO
description: Klarna, which is known for its popular buy now, pay later business, has confidentially filed IPO documents with the U.S. SEC.

title: Amazon debuts discount store with everything under $20 to take on Temu and Shein
description: Called "Amazon Haul," the storefront is accessible through the company's mobile app, and it promises "crazy low prices" on a plethora of goods.

title: OpenAI to present plans for U.S. AI strategy and an alliance to compete with China
description: OpenAI's official blueprint for U.S. AI infrastructure involves AI economic zones and government projects funded by private investors, according to a document.

title: Denmark launches landmark framework for using AI under EU rules — with Microsoft backing
description: Denmark unveiled a blueprint on how to use generative AI in the corporate world to help firms get into compliance with strict new regulation from the EU.

title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.

title: China is catching up with the West on tech, Microsoft president says
description: According to Microsoft's web page about its presence in China, the company has operated there since 1992.

title: Japan is ramping up efforts to revive its once dominant chip industry
description: Japan has announced its latest plan to boost the country's chip and AI industries as it works to regain its leading position in semiconductor technology.

title: Startup CEO says humans won't be needed for translation in 3 years as it launches AI app
description: Unbabel on Wednesday announced an artificial intelligence-powered translation service, adding another rival to a highly competitive space.

title: Dogecoin spikes after Trump announces a Department of Government Efficiency — DOGE
description: Dogecoin shot higher on Tuesday night after President-elect Donald Trump formally announced the creation of the Department of Government Efficiency.
